# Abstract

Participant at the 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee of the China Association for Non-Government Education held in Beijing in September 2025. This meeting brought together educational professionals and experts to discuss strategic directions and initiatives in smart education.

# Event Details

- **Date:** September 2025
- **Location:** Beijing
- **Event:** The 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee
- **Hosting Organization:** China Association for Non-Government Education
- **Role:** Participant

# Audience

This council meeting convened professionals and leaders in the smart education field from the China Association for Non-Government Education to collaboratively advance smart education initiatives and policy discussions.
